card.name: Abuna Acolyte
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."

card.name: Arrest
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

card.name: Auriok Edgewright
card.property: Metalcraft — Auriok Edgewright has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auriok soldiers craft their own weapons, forging a connection to the steel with each blow of the hammer.

card.name: Auriok Sunchaser
card.property: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Auriok Sunchaser gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."—Prayer to the Whitesun

card.name: Dispense Justice
card.property: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Metalcraft — That player sacrifices two attacking creatures instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Accorders never strike first, but they always strike back.

card.name: Elspeth Tirel
card.property: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. −2: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. −5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

card.name: Fulgent Distraction
card.property: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."—Yavash of the Accorders

card.name: Ghalma's Warden
card.property: Metalcraft — Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

card.name: Glimmerpoint Stag
card.property: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Glint Hawk
card.property: Flying When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

card.name: Indomitable Archangel
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand."—Auriok proverb

card.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

card.name: Kemba's Skyguard
card.property: Flying When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . ‘strange.' Regent's orders."—Ranya, skyhunter captain

card.name: Leonin Arbiter
card.property: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirran elders vanished with Memnarch, leaving behind a generation of wayward orphans.

card.name: Myrsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

card.name: Razor Hippogriff
card.property: Flying When Razor Hippogriff enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She incubates her eggs in gold and mana.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

card.name: Salvage Scout
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Salvage Scout: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not saying it's dangerous work. I'm just saying don't sign up if you have plans for your seventieth birthday."

card.name: Seize the Initiative
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The time between spotting a leonin shikari and feeling its claws is just time enough to draw your last breath.

card.name: Soul Parry
card.property: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."—Elspeth Tirel

card.name: Sunblast Angel
card.property: Flying When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

card.name: Sunspear Shikari
card.property: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

card.name: Tempered Steel
card.property: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."—Ghalma the Shaper

card.name: True Conviction
card.property: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dozens of spells known only to the Auriok elders were lost, but the next generation, galvanized by war, devised even more potent magic.

card.name: Vigil for the Lost
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As she grew cold in my arms, I swore an oath that her funeral pyre would be dwarfed by a bonfire of our enemies."

card.name: Whitesun's Passage
card.property: You gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

card.name: Argent Sphinx
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — {U}: Exile Argent Sphinx. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A great mirage, a dream of wings and silver.

card.name: Bonds of Quicksilver
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

card.name: Darkslick Drake
card.property: Flying When Darkslick Drake dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the edge of the Mephidross, Phyrexia's influence seeps into life and land.

card.name: Disperse
card.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most casualties of the power struggle between vedalken and Neurok didn't die on the field of battle; they merely disappeared.

card.name: Dissipation Field
card.property: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strike me once, shame on you. Strike me twice . . . Well, let's just see if you can."—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

card.name: Grand Architect
card.property: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Halt Order
card.property: Counter target artifact spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An artificer's least favorite mind-missive may be "I regret to inform you that the funding for your project has been cut."

card.name: Inexorable Tide
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how gratefully this world accepts our blessings."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Lumengrid Drake
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — When Lumengrid Drake enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Properly outfitted, drakes made perfect sentries for vedalken strongholds.

card.name: Neurok Invisimancer
card.property: Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked. When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

card.name: Quicksilver Gargantuan
card.property: You may have Quicksilver Gargantuan enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's still 7/7.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know you have achieved true power if the sea itself seeks to emulate your greatness."—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

card.name: Riddlesmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

card.name: Scrapdiver Serpent
card.property: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

card.name: Screeching Silcaw
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — Whenever Screeching Silcaw deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.

card.name: Shape Anew
card.property: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

card.name: Sky-Eel School
card.property: Flying When Sky-Eel School enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They swim on tides few can see, away from a threat few yet understand.

card.name: Steady Progress
card.property: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

card.name: Stoic Rebuttal
card.property: Metalcraft — Stoic Rebuttal costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.property: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.property: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Turn Aside
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."

card.name: Twisted Image
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."—Politus, vedalken emisar

card.name: Vault Skyward
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The edges of the Quicksilver Sea run dark with the spread of the Mephidross. Two more aerial passes before I can be sure what I'm seeing . . ."—Lafarius, Neurok sky agent

card.name: Vedalken Certarch
card.property: Metalcraft — {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

card.name: Volition Reins
card.property: Enchant permanent When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it. You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."

card.name: Blackcleave Goblin
card.property: Haste Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitten? Save time, amputate now."—Lephar, loxodon surgeon

card.name: Bleak Coven Vampires
card.property: Metalcraft — When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

card.name: Blistergrub
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sooner you join Phyrexia, the sooner you'll forget your painful rebirth."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Carnifex Demon
card.property: Flying Carnifex Demon enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {B}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Carnifex Demon: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.

card.name: Contagious Nim
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Corrupted Harvester
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Dross Hopper
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Dross Hopper gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.

card.name: Exsanguinate
card.property: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

card.name: Flesh Allergy
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Flesh Allergy, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

card.name: Fume Spitter
card.property: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."—Adaran, Tangle hunter

card.name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Grasp of Darkness
card.property: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On a world with five suns, night is compelled to become an aggressive force.

card.name: Hand of the Praetors
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Other creatures you control with infect get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell with infect, target player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Ichor Rats
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Instill Infection
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."—Vedalken research notes

card.name: Memoricide
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."—Geth, Lord of the Vault

card.name: Necrogen Scudder
card.property: Flying When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.

card.name: Necrotic Ooze
card.property: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."—Geth, Lord of the Vault

card.name: Painful Quandary
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless he or she discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For each word spoken, one forgotten. For each thought, a memory rotten."—Moriok incantation

card.name: Painsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

card.name: Plague Stinger
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

card.name: Psychic Miasma
card.property: Target player discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, return Psychic Miasma to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mind may be steeled against madness, but all battlements fall in time."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Relic Putrescence
card.property: Enchant artifact Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until we shed the curse of sentience, we must endure its grotesque handiwork."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Skinrender
card.property: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Tainted Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Arc Trail
card.property: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to another target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom."—Spear-Tribe teaching

card.name: Assault Strobe
card.property: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When breaking someone's face once just isn't enough.

card.name: Barrage Ogre
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was thrown at them.

card.name: Blade-Tribe Berserkers
card.property: Metalcraft — When Blade-Tribe Berserkers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, Blade-Tribe Berserkers gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodshot Trainee
card.property: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

card.name: Cerebral Eruption
card.property: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature he or she controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

card.name: Embersmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Embersmith deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vulshok see the artificer as a catalyst, bringing the spark of creation that ignites change.

card.name: Ferrovore
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Ferrovore gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vulshok use its digestion to break down the most obstinate metals, from darksteel myr to seastrider plates.

card.name: Flameborn Hellion
card.property: Haste Flameborn Hellion attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most reliable omen of a future hellion attack is a past hellion attack."—Spear-Tribe teaching

card.name: Furnace Celebration
card.property: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Galvanic Blast
card.property: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

card.name: Goblin Gaveleer
card.property: Trample Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

card.name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
card.property: Flying {3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

card.name: Koth of the Hammer
card.property: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. −2: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Mountain you control. −5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

card.name: Kuldotha Phoenix
card.property: Flying, haste Metalcraft — {4}: Return Kuldotha Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Kuldotha Rebirth
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Kuldotha Rebirth, sacrifice an artifact. Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All goblin rituals serve a dual purpose as fertility rites, even the destructive ones. Especially the destructive ones.

card.name: Melt Terrain
card.property: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as the most finely wrought metal can warp and rust, so too does Mirrodin buckle under pressures from without and within.

card.name: Molten Psyche
card.property: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, Molten Psyche deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards that player has drawn this turn.

card.name: Ogre Geargrabber
card.property: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.

card.name: Oxidda Daredevil
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Oxidda Daredevil gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His goggles spattered with grime and his mouth full of bugs, he tossed the engines another priceless relic.

card.name: Oxidda Scrapmelter
card.property: When Oxidda Scrapmelter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It subsists on a diet rich in screaming metal and molten blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am an artist, a builder, a creator . . . I create the biggest explosions around."—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

card.name: Spikeshot Elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now that he knows a thousand ways of hurting people, his next shamanic quest is to discover a thousand more.

card.name: Tunnel Ignus
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Turn to Slag
card.property: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."—Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Vulshok Heartstoker
card.property: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

card.name: Acid Web Spider
card.property: Reach When Acid Web Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Equipment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its web is an excellent source of found copper for the daring or the stupid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger seized the tyrranax, and the Sylvok's vision quest ended in disaster.

card.name: Asceticism
card.property: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let my ignominy build walls thicker than iron and stronger than darksteel."—Thrun, the last troll

card.name: Bellowing Tanglewurm
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Other green creatures you control have intimidate.

card.name: Blight Mamba
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its venom drips with Phyrexia's hate.

card.name: Blunt the Assault
card.property: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Much can be gained from the appearance of vulnerability."—Ezuri, renegade leader

card.name: Carapace Forger
card.property: Metalcraft — Carapace Forger gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bows and whips cannot save us from these new horrors of the Mephidross."

card.name: Carrion Call
card.property: Create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with infect. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The natural order is out of order.

card.name: Copperhorn Scout
card.property: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

card.name: Cystbearer
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia strives to simulate natural life, but it can't resist improving on the design.

card.name: Engulfing Slagwurm
card.property: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

card.name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
card.property: {G}: Regenerate another target Elf. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The infamous Ezuri commands the highest bounty the vedalken have ever placed upon an outlaw.

card.name: Ezuri's Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ezuri's Brigade
card.property: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Ezuri's Brigade gets +4/+4 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Riding ravenous, ever-growing vorracs is almost as dangerous as fitting them with saddles.

card.name: Genesis Wave
card.property: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

card.name: Liege of the Tangle
card.property: Trample Whenever Liege of the Tangle deals combat damage to a player, you may choose any number of target lands you control and put an awakening counter on each of them. Each of those lands is an 8/8 green Elemental creature for as long as it has an awakening counter on it. They're still lands.

card.name: Lifesmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sylvok see the artificer as a gardener, preparing the world for hardy growth.

card.name: Molder Beast
card.property: Trample Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."—Adaran, Tangle hunter

card.name: Putrefax
card.property: Trample, haste Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Putrefax.

card.name: Slice in Twain
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hypocrisy of these elves is thicker than steel—destroying ‘unnatural metal' with their own enchanted swords."—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

card.name: Tangle Angler
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {G}: Target creature blocks Tangle Angler this turn if able.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Defiance
card.property: Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Viridian elves had purged their culture of the trolls' traitorous influence. In times of strife, however, the ancestral memories returned.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Fallen
card.property: Protection from artifacts Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No longer am I shackled to antiquity. My new masters will etch a glorious future."

card.name: Untamed Might
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beasts kill for their very survival. If you would have their strength, you must know their desperation."—Konnos, Sylvok sage

card.name: Viridian Revel
card.property: Whenever an artifact is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them have their revel. Soon those who won't submit will be turned. Those who won't be turned will die."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Wing Puncture
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I were the air, I wouldn't taunt the ground. It has the weight advantage."—Konnos, Sylvok sage

card.name: Withstand Death
card.property: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Mirrodin, every conflict ends in either death or darksteel.

card.name: Venser, the Sojourner
card.property: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. −1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

card.name: Accorder's Shield
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

card.name: Argentum Armor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's creator still lives, still shapes metal, and still commands world-shaking power.

card.name: Auriok Replica
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Auriok Replica: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the loyalty of the Auriok with only a trace of their self-righteousness.

card.name: Barbed Battlegear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +4/-1. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One need only look at the inhabitants of this world to see that they are forged halfway to perfection. All they need is a whisper of the Glorious Word."—Urabrask the Hidden

card.name: Bladed Pinions
card.property: Equipped creature has flying and first strike. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lacking trained pterons, the Auriok had to rely on other measures to gain the upper hand in the skies.

card.name: Chimeric Mass
card.property: Chimeric Mass enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {1}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Mass becomes a Construct artifact creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of charge counters on it."

card.name: Chrome Steed
card.property: Metalcraft — Chrome Steed gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: According to Auriok myth, it collects scrap in order to reassemble its lost rider.

card.name: Clone Shell
card.property: Imprint — When Clone Shell enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Clone Shell dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Contagion Clasp
card.property: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Contagion Engine
card.property: When Contagion Engine enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature target player controls. {4}, {T}: Proliferate, then proliferate again. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there. Then do it again.)

card.name: Copper Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like verdigris: an ever-present patina on the surface of a metal world.

card.name: Corpse Cur
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Corpse Cur enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with infect from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Culling Dais
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Culling Dais. {1}, Sacrifice Culling Dais: Draw a card for each charge counter on Culling Dais.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forswear the flesh and you will truly see."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Darksteel Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

card.name: Darksteel Juggernaut
card.property: Indestructible Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Darksteel Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One part unstoppable force, one part immovable object.

card.name: Darksteel Myr
card.property: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Darksteel Sentinel
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Vigilance Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Echo Circlet
card.property: Equipped creature can block an additional creature each combat. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the vanishing of the elder generations, the Anvil Tribe developed creative solutions to their personnel shortages.

card.name: Etched Champion
card.property: Metalcraft — Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its predecessors were etched with the wisdom of ancients; its own etchings bear warnings of a future fraught with war.

card.name: Flight Spellbomb
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Flight Spellbomb: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. When Flight Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Glint Hawk Idol
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Glint Hawk Idol become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn. {W}: Glint Hawk Idol becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Gold Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like razorgrass: numberless metal figures, reflecting each other's light.

card.name: Golden Urn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Golden Urn. {T}, Sacrifice Golden Urn: You gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Golden Urn.

card.name: Golem Artisan
card.property: {2}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}: Target artifact creature gains your choice of flying, trample, or haste until end of turn.

card.name: Golem Foundry
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may put a charge counter on Golem Foundry. Remove three charge counters from Golem Foundry: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Golem's Heart
card.property: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heart of a golem gives life to more than just the iron husk around it.

card.name: Grafted Exoskeleton
Grindclock
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on Grindclock. {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on Grindclock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray you never hear it chime.

card.name: Heavy Arbalest
Horizon Spellbomb
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Spellbomb: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. When Horizon Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Ichorclaw Myr
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Ichorclaw Myr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Infiltration Lens
card.property: Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by a creature, you may draw two cards. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Neurok spies carry devices that let them look a few moments into the future, giving them an almost insurmountable edge.

card.name: Iron Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like rusted metal: gleaming purpose hidden by a thin disguise of debris.

card.name: Kuldotha Forgemaster
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for an artifact card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins say it used to be larger, before it began to stoke the Great Furnace with pieces of itself.

card.name: Leaden Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like necrogen: a transformative force unconcerned with the changes they wreak.

card.name: Liquimetal Coating
card.property: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They'll soon become accustomed to wearing skin that is not their own."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Livewire Lash
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell, this creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player." Equip {2}

card.name: Lux Cannon
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on Lux Cannon. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Lux Cannon: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are few problems that can't be solved by putting a hole in the world.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.

card.name: Mimic Vat
card.property: Imprint — Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Mimic Vat to its owner's graveyard. {3}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with Mimic Vat. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mindslaver
card.property: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's a helm that leaves the head at its most vulnerable.

card.name: Molten-Tail Masticore
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Molten-Tail Masticore unless you discard a card. {4}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Molten-Tail Masticore deals 4 damage to target creature or player. {2}: Regenerate Molten-Tail Masticore.

card.name: Moriok Replica
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice Moriok Replica: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the secrets of the Moriok with only a trace of their corruption.

card.name: Mox Opal
card.property: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The suns of Mirrodin have shone upon perfection only once.

card.name: Myr Battlesphere
card.property: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to defending player.

card.name: Myr Galvanizer
card.property: Other Myr creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}, {T}: Untap each other Myr you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't quite determine what they're doing, but they seem to be doing it quite well."—Vedalken research notes

card.name: Myr Propagator
card.property: {3}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of Myr Propagator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will ingest and remake this world in our image, not unlike some admirable designs I have seen here."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Myr Reservoir
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Myr spells or activate abilities of Myr. {3}, {T}: Return target Myr card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mana well as bottomless as the myr are tireless.

card.name: Necrogen Censer
card.property: Necrogen Censer enters the battlefield with two charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Necrogen Censer: Target player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moriok necromancers actively spread necrogen, encouraging the transformation from Mirran to nim.

card.name: Necropede
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Necropede dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Neurok Replica
card.property: {1} {U}, Sacrifice Neurok Replica: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the curiosity of the Neurok with only a trace of their duplicity.

card.name: Nihil Spellbomb
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Nim Deathmantle
Origin Spellbomb
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Origin Spellbomb: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token. When Origin Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {W}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Palladium Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.

card.name: Panic Spellbomb
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Panic Spellbomb: Target creature can't block this turn. When Panic Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Perilous Myr
card.property: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

card.name: Platinum Emperion
card.property: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It ignores such insignificant forces as time, entropy, and death.

card.name: Precursor Golem
card.property: When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

card.name: Prototype Portal
card.property: Imprint — When Prototype Portal enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

card.name: Ratchet Bomb
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: DANGER! Keep appendages clear of front of machine. And rear of machine. And side of machine. And top of machine.

card.name: Rust Tick
card.property: You may choose not to untap Rust Tick during your untap step. {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Rust Tick remains tapped.

card.name: Rusted Relic
card.property: Metalcraft — Rusted Relic is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We consider rust a curable disease."—Tarrin, Hammer-Tribe shaman

card.name: Saberclaw Golem
card.property: {R}: Saberclaw Golem gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The warriors of the Blade Tribe charged the golem, twenty strong. They returned numbering ten . . . and a half.

card.name: Semblance Anvil
card.property: Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand. Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Silver Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like quicksilver: malleable in function and adaptable in form.

card.name: Snapsail Glider
card.property: Metalcraft — Snapsail Glider has flying as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built from a reconfigured thresher, it charges with light reflected off the golden plain, ready to take to the air in case of danger.

card.name: Soliton
card.property: {U}: Untap Soliton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gemini engines had lost connection with each other and wandered apart, developing an independent awareness of their surroundings.

card.name: Steel Hellkite
card.property: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Strata Scythe
Strider Harness
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each journey begins with a single step—and sometimes ends with that single step as well.

card.name: Sword of Body and Mind
Sylvok Lifestaff

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druid's lifestaff connects her to generations of bygone Sylvok.

card.name: Sylvok Replica
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Sylvok Replica: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the zeal of the Sylvok with only a trace of their conservancy.

card.name: Throne of Geth
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the heart of Ish Sah, Geth stokes the dark fires of Phyrexia.

card.name: Tower of Calamities
card.property: {8}, {T}: Tower of Calamities deals 12 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ur-golems concealed one of their towers out of fear that its power would be abused, and in anticipation of a time when its power would be sorely needed.

card.name: Trigon of Corruption
card.property: Trigon of Corruption enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {B}{B}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Corruption. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Corruption: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Infestation
card.property: Trigon of Infestation enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Infestation. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Infestation: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with infect.

card.name: Trigon of Mending
card.property: Trigon of Mending enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {W}{W}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Mending. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Mending: Target player gains 3 life.

card.name: Trigon of Rage
card.property: Trigon of Rage enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {R}{R}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Rage. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Rage: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trigon of Thought
card.property: Trigon of Thought enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {U}{U}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Thought. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Thought: Draw a card.

card.name: Tumble Magnet
card.property: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magnetic devices that keep massive golems and structures standing can also be used for the opposite purpose.

card.name: Vector Asp
card.property: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia's machines take inspiration from nature. Twisted, disturbing inspiration.

card.name: Venser's Journal
card.property: You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Planeswalker's chronicle spans worlds and civilizations, each page a lifetime.

card.name: Vulshok Replica
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: Vulshok Replica deals 3 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the fury of the Vulshok with only a trace of their recklessness.

card.name: Wall of Tanglecord
card.property: Defender {G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rootlike fibers travel far from Mirrodin's metallic forests, emerging from the crust to drink in the mana-infused sunlight.

card.name: Wurmcoil Engine
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Blackcleave Cliffs
card.property: Blackcleave Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the Oxidda Chain mingles with the Mephidross, oil-suffused metal crumbles away, leaving walls of blackened bones.

card.name: Copperline Gorge
card.property: Copperline Gorge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the Tangle overruns the Oxidda mountains, metallic beasts scratch their territories in the verdigris.

card.name: Darkslick Shores
card.property: Darkslick Shores enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the Mephidross leaches into the Quicksilver Sea, the waves writhe with necrogen.

card.name: Glimmerpost
card.property: When Glimmerpost enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each Locus on the battlefield. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What once spied upon Mirrodin from above now waits below for another to assume control.

card.name: Razorverge Thicket
card.property: Razorverge Thicket enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the Razor Fields beat back the Tangle, the crowded thicket yields to bright scimitars of grass.

card.name: Seachrome Coast
card.property: Seachrome Coast enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the Quicksilver Sea laps over the Razor Fields, the landscape reflects the suns' fading hope.
